high_descs: Turn around to the shelf by the book shelf
Grab the pencil in the shelf
Put the pencil in the cup on top of the shelf
Grab the cup with the pencil in it
Walk to the left a little
put the cup with the pencil in the shelf
anns.task_desc: put the pencil in the cup, put it in the shelf

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the short black desk across the room next to the books.
Pick up the pencil from the right edge of the shelf under the top of the desk.
Put the pencil inside the white mug on top of the desk.
Pick up the mug with the pencil inside of it from on top of the desk.
Turn around, hang a right at the edge of the black dresser, walk towards the door and turn right to face the left side of the black desk.
Place the mug with the pencil inside on the shelf under the desk to the left of the CD.
anns.task_desc: Place a mug with a pencil on a shelf.

high_descs: Turn around, go straight to the stand with the mug on it.
Take the pen from the shelf below the mug.
Put the pen in the mug that is on top of the stand.
Take the mug from the stand.
Go left slightly while still facing towards the stand.
Put the mug on the shelf where the pen was to the left of the CD.
anns.task_desc: Put a mug on a shelf of a stand.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the small table with the coffee mug on it, to the right of the tall book shelf.
Pick up the pencil on the edge of the shelf, under the top of the black table.
Place the pencil in the coffee mug, to the right of the keys, on the top of the black table.
Pick up the coffee mug with the pencil inside it.
Move over to the left so that your are standing in front of the left most corner of the small, black table.
Place the coffee mug with the pencil inside, to the left of the CD, on the shelf directly under the top of the table.
anns.task_desc: Place a coffee cup containing a pencil on the shelf of a small table.
